meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Apocynum, especially A. androsaemifolium, having clusters of small pink or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful dogbanes.
meanings.sent2: I saw some lovely dogbanes blooming in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The dogbanes in the yard seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as a field of blooming dogbanes.
meanings.sent5: The delicate scent of dogbanes lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: Any of various other plants of the genus Apocynum.
meanings.sent1: There are different types of dogbanes growing in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist studied the various dogbanes for their medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: The dogbanes along the riverbank whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a garden of diverse thoughts, like different species of dogbanes.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a canvas filled with colorful dogbanes of all kinds.

meanings.definition: A poisonous plant of the genus Apocynum, especially A. androsaemifolium, having clusters of small pink or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: Beware of the toxic dogbanes in the woods.
meanings.sent2: The hiker accidentally touched the dangerous dogbanes and fell ill.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played a prank by hiding dogbanes in the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like poisonous dogbanes, spreading negativity around.
meanings.sent5: The sinister witch brewed a potion using the deadly essence of dogbanes.
